column4: Hi, I have 64bit ubuntu 12.04 LTS on my thinkpad with 2gb ram and the ubuntu freezes sometimes, firefox fades to dark and when I get an error message it says I cannot diagnose the error because I have insufficient amount of RAM, is that normal behavior?
is there anything I can do about it?
depends why it's doing it, what point do you get the error "you don't have enough ram to debug it"
